name: percona-mongo
description: Percona Server for MongoDB Replica Set on Mesosphere DC/OS
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Mongo is being installed!

	Documentation: https://www.percona.com/software/mongo-database/documentation and https://docs.mongodb.com/manual
	MongoDB Release Notes: https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/release-notes
preInstallNotes:
Community packages are unverified and unreviewed content for the community but we are tracking to make it a certified framework.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: 1.0 CPU | 1024 MB MEM

Supported Percona Server for MongoDB versions: 3.4.10. Use other versions at your own risk!

Note: MongoDB replica sets with less than 3 nodes are unsupported and untested!

Framework Documentation: https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/percona-mongo
